name: BEARS, VODKA, BALALAIKA! 🐻
description:
BEARS, VODKA, BALALAIKA! - is a realistic shooting game in a historic period of World War II of great Soviet Union. You play as generic russian solider trying to defend your Great Motherland with the widely famous AK-47.

Your main goal is to kill as many enemies as possible and defend the Motherland from nazi occupation.

Features:

  • Truly russian spirit and atmosphere
  • Play as russian bear
  • Shoot legendary russian weapon - AK-47
  • Drink honest russian Vodka
  • Play on balalaika
